name: True Visions
storyline: People want their houses to be redesigned and you are the qualified architect for this. You can show your creativity and imagination on the jobs you applied. Climb the steps of success rapidly and be the patron of your own business. In True Visions, you can move, rotate or resize walls, furniture according to your taste without any limitation. Control is completely in your hands.
summary: True Visions is a game where you can design houses from top to the bottom as an architect. Start your career as a freelancer, climb up step by step and establish your own company.
